title: Can't log in
body:
Hi
I haven't been able to log in since last night. My client took 3-4 mins Authnticating and said "**unexpected error occur"**.
I've tried to reset the internet, scaned for viruses, followed the instruction on the website **"Setting up your Permissions"**, when i tried the **Hextech Repair Tool** it kept saying Starting forever and did nothing (tried reinstalling).

Any ideas whats happening? Anything else I should try?
Thanks heaps

replies.body: It's possible that your current firewall settings might be blocking your network from reaching the login servers. Do me a favor and [**update your firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) really quickly, but definitely let me know if those steps didn't help.
I've changed the router setting and it works now. Thanks for your help
Ooooo which router settings did you update btw? I'm really interested in exactly what fixed this so I have more tool in mah poro-belt xD!

Thank you for the response,
I added exeption from the firewall, check updates and even turn it off, but nothing changed. The only thing I haven't tried is reinstalling the game.
